Inglewood.KDLD:
KDLD is a commercial radio station in Santa Monica, California, broadcasting to the Los Angeles area on 103.1 FM. KDLE is a commercial radio station in Newport Beach, California, broadcasting to the Orange County area on 103.1 FM.
KDLD & KDLE air a Spanish-language music format branded as "La Tricolor 97.5 Y 103.1" on its analog and main HD Radio signal. The format is Spanish adult hits.
"La Tricolor" has studios located in Los Angeles' Miracle Mile, and KDLD's transmitter is located in Baldwin Hills, while KDLE's transmitter is based in Irvine.
